title: Ten Thousand Heaven Controlling Swords - Novel Updates
description: Chunryu walked forward, Hwayeon and Hyunhyun followed him from behind. Chunryu will become a Sword God and be exalted by every martial artist. Hwayeon who will become a female emperor who will receive the adoration of ten thousand civilians. Hyunhyun, the most talented woman the martial world has ever seen who will bring peace to the central China.>
